circle.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linejoin: bevel; stroke-width: 4px;

line.style: fill: #231f20; stroke: #ed2024; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 8px;
fill: #231f20; stroke: #ed2024; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 8px;
fill: #231f20; stroke: #ed2024; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 8px;
